thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: Lou

author: Lou
title: Lou
text:
I have known Nikolas for the last 10 years plus who has managed my properties in all that time and still does today.
Nik has always managed my properties with professionalism and care and has never found a difficult situation too difficult to overcome. I have found him to be prompt in attending to tenants enquiries and notifying me immediately when issues have arisen at the properties, whether they were of low or high priority.
I have no hesitation in recommending Nik to future landlords as he will devote all his attention to their managing properties with the utmost diligence and care to ensure that the properties are maintained properly so that their values are preserved at the end of the day.
